title: 0.0 Introduction to EEE Course
des: In this session, we discuss the course structure and how to prepare yourself for competitive examinations

title: 1.1 Basics of Electric Circuits
des: Covers Ohm's Law, basic circuit elements, and simple series-parallel combinations.

title: 1.2 Current and Voltage Analysis
des: Learn the relationship between voltage and current using Kirchhoff's laws.

title: 1.3 AC vs DC Systems
des: An overview of alternating current and direct current with real-world applications.

title: 1.4 Measurement Instruments
des: Introduction to multimeters, oscilloscopes, and wattmeters for electrical labs.

title: 1. 5 Introduction to Transformers
des: Understand the working principle and types of electrical transformers.

title: 1. 6 Basics of Power Generation
des: Explore hydro, thermal, and solar power generation concepts.

title: 1.7 Semiconductors and Diodes
des: A beginner-friendly introduction to semiconductors, PN junctions, and diodes.

title: 1. 8 Digital Logic Basics
des: Covers logic gates, truth tables, and basic combinational circuits.

title: 1.9 Introduction to Signals and Systems
des: Learn the fundamentals of signals, time domain analysis, and classifications.
